newsitem.title: USA: QuesTec Imaging hires financial adviser.
newsitem.headline: QuesTec Imaging hires financial adviser.

text.p: QuesTec Imaging Inc said on Wednesday it retained New York-based Renwick Corporate Finance Inc as its financial advisor to help develop business strategies, provide investment banker services and assess strategic business alliances.
Renwick specialized in providing financial advisory services to smaller capitalized public companies, it said.
Renwick would also help develop market maker support and additional relationships in the investment community, QuesTec said. QuesTec develops and markets software systems.
